snippet: A year ago, a lot of people doubted that consumer businesses like Facebook and Twitter even had much of a place in corporations. Now there are lots of acquisitions by some of the biggest old-line companies in tech.
abstract: A year ago, a lot of people doubted that consumer businesses like Facebook and Twitter even had much of a place in corporations. Now there are lots of acquisitions by some of the biggest old-line companies in tech.

headline.main: Big Business's Social Media Buying Frenzy
